name: MinitGuess
tagline: Automating Initial Guess Generation in Mystic
body:
### Welcome to the MinitGuess Homepage!
MinitGuess is an open source software toolbox designed to allow the automation of initial guess generation for orbital mechanics problems. Containing pre-computed data and models along with sample scenarios, the software allows for orbit creation and dynamical model integration in medium fidelity for feasibility analysis and export to higher fidelity models. 

### Features
1. A Dynamical System Exploration Toolbox
2. Dynamical Model Set: includes CR3BP, EH3BP, etc.
3. Orbit Database: pre-computed orbits (periodic, quasi-periodic, etc.)
4. Object-oriented approach for easy code reuse and maintenance
5. Graphical User Interface (GUI) or Command-Line Interface (CLI) available

![](https://raw.github.com/JPLMinitGuess/JPLMinitGuess.github.io/master/Hebes_Chasma_landslides.jpg)

### Download
Click the download icons at the top of the homepage or download the files at [http://github.com/JPLMinitGuess/JPLMinitGuess.github.io](http://github.com/JPLMinitGuess/JPLMinitGuess.github.io)

### Contributors
* Benjamin Villac: project management and GUI layout, tools implementation
* Navid Nakhjiri: models, integration, maps, testing
* Hsuan-Chen Wan (@walterwan): GUI development, quasi-periodic orbit class, models
* Olivia Domenici: GUI development
* Eric Arnal Fort: periodic orbit database, discrete searches
* Jesse Campbell: function representation via NURBS, approximation techniques
* Adam Shutts: models, website

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with MinitGuess? Please refer to the Wiki at [http://github.com/JPLMinitGuess/JPLMinitGuess.github.io](http://github.com/JPLMinitGuess/JPLMinitGuess.github.io) for tutorials and descriptions of tool and
